languages.text: "Не начни ты мне угрожать, все могло бы пройти иначе. Но ты начал — а значит, умрешь".

traits.locale_text: "Не начни ты мне угрожать, все могло бы пройти иначе. Но ты начал — а значит, умрешь".

languages.text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."
languages.original_text: "Не начни ты мне угрожать, все могло бы пройти иначе. Но ты начал — а значит, умрешь".

traits.locale_text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you had. And for that, you will die."
"If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you had. And for that, you will die."
"If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."
"If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."
"If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."

languages.text: 「お前が{mf|俺|私}を脅していなければ、物事は違っていたかもしれない。だが、お前は脅した。そしてそれ故に、お前は死ぬ」
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が{mf|俺|私}を脅していなければ、物事は違っていたかもしれない。だが、お前は脅した。そしてそれ故に、お前は死ぬ」

languages.text: “如果你没有威胁我的性命，这件事情说不定还有转圜的余地。但你既然敢威胁我，那你就必死无疑了。”
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."

traits.locale_text: “如果你没有威胁我的性命，这件事情说不定还有转圜的余地。但你既然敢威胁我，那你就必死无疑了。”

languages.text: « Si vous ne m'aviez pas {mf|menacé|menacée}, les choses auraient pu se passer différemment. Mais vous avez commis une grave erreur, et vous allez le payer de votre vie. »
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous ne m'aviez pas {mf|menacé|menacée}, les choses auraient pu se passer différemment. Mais vous avez commis une grave erreur, et vous allez le payer de votre vie. »

languages.text: «Si no me hubieras amenazado, las cosas podrían haber sido diferentes. Pero lo has hecho, y ahora morirás».
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."

traits.locale_text: «Si no me hubieras amenazado, las cosas podrían haber sido diferentes. Pero lo has hecho, y ahora morirás».

languages.text: "Hättet Ihr mir nicht gedroht, wäre es vielleicht anders abgelaufen. Habt Ihr aber. Und dafür werdet Ihr sterben."
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."

traits.locale_text: "Hättet Ihr mir nicht gedroht, wäre es vielleicht anders abgelaufen. Habt Ihr aber. Und dafür werdet Ihr sterben."

languages.text: "Beni tehdit etmeseydin her şey daha farklı olabilirdi. Ancak yapacağını yaptın... Bedelini canınla ödeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "If you hadn't threatened me, things could have gone differently. But you did. And for that, you will die."

traits.locale_text: "Beni tehdit etmeseydin her şey daha farklı olabilirdi. Ancak yaptın yapacağını... Bedelini canınla ödeyeceksin."
